MOD = 10**9 + 7

def solve():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))

    count = 0
    
    import itertools
    for perm in itertools.permutations(range(1, n + 1)):
        valid = True
        for i in range(n):
            left_count = sum(1 for j in range(i) if perm[j] < perm[i])
            right_count = sum(1 for j in range(i + 1, n) if perm[j] < perm[i])
            if abs(left_count - right_count) != a[i]:
                valid = False
                break
        if valid:
            count += 1

    print(count % MOD)

solve()
